Name: On Earth As It Is In Heaven - A Kinetic Novel
About the game: Within the flower of happiness, the seeds of tragedy. The sky is blue and the sun is shining and the green leaves are rustling in the cool breeze. Itâ€™s a perfect day. Such a perfect day, no one would have guessed that gas has been leaking in the power station since midnight, and the situation there had long deteriorated beyond critical. Sencil is a scribe in heaven that works for the God of Calamities. However, as he is kind of heart, he has repeatedly lowered or completely negated the casualties of disasters ordered by the God of Calamities. He is finally caught and banished to the mortal realm - To be exact, Laguna de Duero, Valladolid in Spain. However, he is helped by the kind Montero family that owns a meat and sausage shop. A kinetic novel that has about 3 hours worth of immersive writing and reading brought to you by the writers of A More Beautiful World, When Our Journey Ends and more!
